yt ad
her̅ tom
n̅ dyt chaß [.] aß [.] dyt he d
ort nair̅ w
di

faida [.] a tysw
holl y̅lit mir̅ [.] Enyt [.] & ne
ben̅ git lotht
ben ebey̅ [.] tolg
ny̅ ben & ben ne var̅re breat er ord [marginal ?]
o Ȝoyn̅ he ben i̅ tessi [.] co Ȝoyn̅ hir̅
ben se di ven & ȝa̅tone he acht
oyrt ben bi doil Eacht a che̅nyt
er rair̅ chraa // is marg id taa rnir̅ I teig
lirg a Ȝail na lea marg na feadi
id tagg nnis pen̅ ne heik ca
da lawryt y̅ neigt na ven roe merg

voll
nyni ny̅ vane gi̅ tathi ȝa
ȝyr̅ is fa ȝai Keil
is toyth vrrinn choir̅ di vac
dur̅rin er ȝolle ȝlan mi che
hi̅ny̅ er mave myrvael da ȝrinni [.] tall
dovir̅ mac ag fin an r̅ac i̅ gom [.] chotchin
ȝilli g͘oyt motery elli ag tyl [.] ynni alve
i̅ vil aggit so ȝwle layt tyl
dolb i̅ ny̅ intin chaa i̅ [.] aa
ossin vor̅ vc fin na chilt
cheive er chalmyt
ȝe chonni sloe celli na
ey bog twle stom faa Kayv g
g [.] agis a velli [.] agis Eait
corle fin na ni sloye
higidd̅ er ȝolle
cha chellmyn̅ gnew chan̅ g
na f[.]lling jar̅ri a ȝwle vor̅
gin lagga di ra
lac͘ so di corle er ȝyr̅ a ȝwle s
le con̅e [.] ga gor̅ ne

Digir̅ [.] no cha̅ nay [.] no
cha nayir̅ i̅ er foß hugis ȝi royn a roßg
ead [.] ȝleg i̅ gla [.] Eaid is awȝlig a riß
a weil hugit is woyd be cut agga gi
cut doe drot hang dane is drong eale chwnl
boyn deve brey borb gi rosk gorm is galde
y̅ beit i̅ vir facȝheis is nat lerggit seiß i̅
cut agga crawa ceive leß nat dry̅ neicht
chynni er i̅ deggow ead beg ȝa dugi Keale
drammi hoßdi du̅ ni mna̅w̅e̅ nat fadyr̅ do ȝ
dram howaldi ȝeive poß is lowne gi mor̅ wll
fa mna̅w̅e̅ der̅rir̅ vle rew sin di crag ne vl
ach ba̅nisg i̅ do drane i̅ vil sorre is schear̅
gi Invin laid cheal how ne hay ȝoo ȝi rowm
deey̅ a ȝin lawrit fir̅ seißa a le̅a[.]t[.]ȝ
Na kneist ȝvrnner doyn gin veskga
faa vlaß di var̅re sangi aß sin oir̅sen

Invin toe lawe ȝouyȝhe ir nail vlli er a hi̅
Ȝark a low lawe ȝouȝhe [.] o [.] St. horch̅ [.] clar̅
lawe rain ne roymmi er lawe vonyt done deir̅ri [marginal ?]
[marginal sic] Lawe mi ȝaldi bert vra̅ neitw a̅ new o chaita c
Lawe rayg er nor̅ virt voynit lawe hug mor̅ totrvirt
Lawe mi ȝaldi deil daive mi ȝunyt suevo
We er no lave loyan̅ sal ȝa hanyt di ȝayvin
Invyn leynnyt i̅ laive allin nawra ayr̅rin tal
Lawe E waiȝon vyir̅ri lawe bi chait y̅ir̅ in nir̅rit
Hug leith oynnyt er mawryt i̅ nalve dyir̅ er i̅

Gerroid Erla etc.
Faalligan beg failligan [.] magnyt feyn i̅ gulligan
[marginal ? so] Is sa i̅ tur̅ri mi va̅nigane me̅ roit [.] bakka [marginal ?]
Achaie mcihse̅ dudigane ayt reim er grattegane [marginal ?]
[marginal is blank] gi ban chassil chwlligan fa hattala mi
var̅ri veyit oir̅rigane fa wair̅ ni verigane
roive maa er noeif neivgane es neir̅ g
ffailligane

Cor̅ faitw er olswe albin sche nyedin [.] ȝve gi maid
Mass lann lave a cheym i̅ g̅ gaif̅ in dem̅ ella ead
Necor̅feig in duß gyt agyt ga clwne̅ ni nat ne nac͘ doe
Niyr̅ hac͘ gyt raa reyve in negre ne mat keyel gy̅ regryt chor̅
In tyvyr̅ fa ville myt hachre ne math glor̅ gin keel re coß
a ta bree in dane̅ a na ny̅sk de chem ta ȝa hynsa noß
Ac so geil di clinn ȝalt̅ ag rair̅ fille farda a ȝna
ga ta misse er dail o wrou̅w is Kist dawe is ollewai
one̅ Stewart a ceith ra̅nyt a lave geil is far̅ boe
Gawe a leith is solt in gaga leith volt & bagre voym̅
hangiß tuggit vcßr robert a one̅ Stewart ny̅ rosk gorm̅
ber̅ a claa nat my̅ fa weyir̅ braa is sin de ȝ͘eyr orm̅
Ffeya mir̅ a tacta mtam abbin romßa a ȝeil nat me̅ morn̅
[marginal sic] ahur̅ war̅ ȝask ȝegni len̅ ane̅ nast caddna om orn̅
Gaf di ry vcßr Robert tallyt rvuma ga beg mi hort
na how tyr̅ laye̅ y̅ loggir̅ is me i̅ vir̅ clair̅ coggi ort
Maß se di corle vone bea gy̅ etta a olta rea
A lawe rane̅ ny̅ geil so̅nw fa sayn nir̅ eir̅ id chonw ai
A chocullin clynna ȝalt ̾ one̅ lair̅ nor̅ wer̅ nort sorve
A lat is trane gnwß yre calle ne yȝane cuß falle orve
Ne we toe er hoon na er her̅rin gy̅ eir̅ lbvmsa a lacht taal
Na ha̅nit lai i̅ nai̅b alt na̅ i̅ tayt ȝavi̅ ȝra̅ta ȝareg [marginal ?]
Ne wee myr̅ a ȝomon tallyt ga deggir̅ linn dulfou̅ fon noß
Ach for̅ er i̅ vaid eir̅ a bagre din vaid dein id taggit foß
De arsyt ruttis vcßr robert ageil nat crein vin croyve
ffa mow i̅ dee ȝut mi hegwail na see agis beggan doise
gna bi tußa a hollis orrim neve ny̅ merneir̅ ney̅ goggi sorve
[marginal ?] is far̅ ȝut gi rvo ȝail won tegna na ȝawal myr̅ er̅ri orve
ga ȝani me mir is coßwil di chanyt ma̅ß dowryt lynn
[marginal #] beg/in faich mi vart ra veich a thraiet lat y̅ geyl grinn
beg in gyil dwß syt rair̅ neir̅re marru̅nse fa heyrik chronn
beg a wree gi mak ag maiyr̅ a heil slat o chaac͘ choonn
Ne ha͘wil sen̅id ta suß vccaltyr̅ is far̅ Kyil
A laiwe thrayn̅ o Inni i̅ doyn nat dar̅ filli royn̅m reyvi
Macth mi ȝyil remyt ȝeymma orrit di heve Stheddais solsa [marginal x]
[marginal x] Di ȝai woß myr̅ eilla gin wrail si chossa nar̅ ymma teac͘ ȝoyle
[marginal ?] loir̅ nave mo hang͘a gín ȝressit marg a ȝreissyt ne reim binn
A ȝaid is gal rowne̅ na is gar̅ is far gin sow nar̅resinna

Dunca͘ Mc cowle veil
[marginal ?] MilevinMarvin woyme gow o̅one McKnessȝil challen chamboil
[marginal ?] Da chree chim oß gyt fir bea choit aggis marvyn

ard̅ la rechta gow re brawin ny̅ brow [.] ȝin
Glaß in broein nalle nalin wleye veindone
Naw ra danyt na̅ ra schemhis is dolta ȝonyt
Nan ra seir̅syt a chrayin gi gelyt gi bar̅ boclyt
Nan ra gronyt na̅ ra seimmyt na sechna ba̅nale
dolt ȝa cheyve cla̅ or nar ear̅ a̅eawe
ra cardyt na̅ ra crossanyt winni voyneit
dolb gow oorork roytin de cort choe
[marginal ?] Glaß see crossanyt myt chardsyt ne eard owyr̅
chmyt la freit ir wyvir̅ gow leit lovmeit
[marginal sic]aa ta /miß y̅ crossane ag oochowee ny̅ golk scharryt [marginal ?]
Sgyr̅ ba bar̅ bren nyt broenyt teyg nyt tawryt
Teyg ni tewrat Teyg teive oylleit id ta i̅ nuht [marginal ?]
Trur̅ nar̅ chur̅ i̅ nannytt er eltew carrit cwmhir̅ [marginal ?]
Agis car cw̅bir̅ In car coerawyr̅ cloet wea in go [marginal ?]
cho̅ chowir̅ vcneß Agis in lae fail finni hawryt hug
er twß in neyrin Agis di weet in vastenyt var̅ cha
t gesga clot dy̅neit clothewsey̅ fa oororf s in
reit ffy̅ bea cogew neyve mor̅reit gy̅ nail eilli
beit sail is cart ni branyt i̅ glak/ ni greive
nacht leawdens clynni nail daa drenale̅
ʅEnyt i̅ lem er lenni di neit neillim er i̅
[marginal ?] hor̅ le toya y̅ deiskirdi dywassi dalchenyt Da
[marginal d] chee gra̅monyt ȝanyt ir a chur̅ wyir̅ aa [marginal ?]
Deichit gyt ha̅wallir dyt na hy̅ ȝryma ra na
Dwnni i̅ dew fateit nyt feilly̅ni / ne mir̅ sen di
oorork a choggi er nyt cogreitchew at i̅ gaß
Storatyt agis i̅ machir̅ra dilonni̅ ga agis ta̅nallyt
Aewsetha dettyt wor̅ di chor woß a gemni d
Di chon̅a fey a fei [.] dy̅ney ella
Di chon̅a na fei a fwnnyt er meye me̅ nyt
Di hor̅ oorok ceach is cor̅ra teach is te̅nyt
Teggiß gor̅ra gir ȝawe oorork it deil da
Gill glassyt galyt geylyt nawnyt maryt

Idta fane̅ tullyt so toye mcveckowle is croy coll [marginal x]
[marginal ?] Mcdadȝeul ne y̅ in derk nat tug ra erk brayar̅ borb
Id ta fane̅ tullyt so deß mcvekgoyne̅ Kaneß myr̅ wlae
Cha dar̅ sai nac͘ fa neit in greß not char̅ veine̅ yt lawe
Id ta fo tullyt hoirryt oßgyr̅ bi vac͘ gol is gneyt
Clan morn gai mac͘ ni fir not char̅ chur̅ sai sen i̅ breit
Id ta fa tullyt so har̅ gillyt bi van leß nyt manaie
[marginal soo] Mcrorane̅ dar̅ weyt clair̅ fane̅ tellyt soo soy har̅ It ta [marginal x]
Id ta fane̅ twllyt so foyme̅ Innar̅ vyt von groik is gra [marginal x]
Con̅na̅ dyt ȝoif gyt murn fa tullyt fume̅ Id ta Id ta

A hud̅ so Dunca͘ Campbel etc
ffadda o walle dea na ma̅c ne henyt rayt i̅ ba gyt holk
O hawd re millyt gyt sloye o eßroye gow hy̅nis ork
O chapud fenis mo ȝeß guß yt verve byt wreß cuvroe [marginal curm ?]
Ne el oibven no ben lai riß nor̅ y̅po dea ȝrwne̅
N [.] yrriß awyier̅ nir̅ gow hirris dyt chrat mcroye
Ne ellit ben sne royve reyve fuac͘ da walle dea fane
chadwin dyt wallyt dea eaw nir̅ vai s
[marginal C?] threid mir̅ varle y̅ wen doyt aw i̅ se̅nor troy [marginal ?]
Da bi ben roit eawe and ath gai dossyt byt clai [marginal ?]
he ȝyt walle ȝyt dea ath ven dyt we a er deß [marginal ?]
Woo ta mna malleit reyve is dyt ȝoyne̅ dea gyt b
Is myr̅ sen dyt nat gor̅ ȝin bi gane̅ deggiß ne el s owalle de [marginal ?]

Ahoud̅ so Gerroid erle
Tor is ste ȝrolan veg & corteit feine̅ dyt neit
Dit varin dut cluk ny̅ gail nat dany̅ fallit ort [marginal x]
a how feine̅ oglyevor̅ na ka teir̅ aß ville dyt ly
so a how yt cla̅nyt ny glann nor̅ higgin i̅ nawle er heit
McVek me Vorth ncVrane̅ nor ellyt reyve meßk gawlt
Nar̅ wein is teir̅ hor̅ is dem ȝerryt treat ny̅ dorryt Tar

Ahoud̅ so Dunca͘ Mor̅ o daly etc.
Draane̅ one̅ Invin fait ir gordyt chin gyt ane lai
[marginal i] ne is tole reid nit haith er gayit ir gor̅ orrgill
[marginal i] Ir Ville ir ver̅ dan quhoy ȝore oddail yt
[marginal ?] Tore chwlle dyt hoare in tellow is ne ȝoyt vlli dane̅ lon
[marginal ?] A chalane̅ is croye lam crey ʅ ye clannyt curkeit
yt er naik a day ayne̅ da vorkyt ȝe yk in drayane̅
Drayane̅

fynn o'Daly
[marginal ?] Hark maillis mvrn in theil gar̅ wiris boig esy [.] vor̅yny
Mark noth reoche vin E er reein droth heil dekry
[marginal ?] fflavonß mor̅ ar mvrn̅ vyg bea heyr̅ er hal ȝerryt
Treeksin dee as deinoy an dail er ree ȝemon i̅ doynan̅
A ȝeyna ȝa dalt̅ rath leß nat beg maid ir myrit
ffyr̅ soig i̅ swna as sloir̅ leif gy̅ soig is sulle ȝaksin
Soig na soigrade neoyf at ta foaß fan̅ teyrg̅e
gach soig fa neyf sacha sin es baa yr̅ in noywy
Da ȝa rwyg sen ag so skail vo̅nis riß di rair̅ eyr̅ane̅
[marginal sic] Scail a traay̅ byntor noif ga baa Strystour̅ vor̅ streif
[marginal ? B] Sen torrath ar ag toagar bradda de wee in pusone fe̅nidda
[marginal ? B] Sair̅rir̅ ȝi chad ȝee ny̅ nwle la la̅nof beg sin breisson̅
Ar na wree diwe i̅ makaw a faß myr̅ gathfochlagan̅
Da Erygny mor gwbeig ȝone̅ sell dy bleigny sin breisson̅
In ny̅in ag toag breeda me̅na i̅ la̅vo neir̅ lwidda
E ȝa rair̅ ga di wee in bradda myr̅ wree gy̅ fane̅ gy̅ fy̅
Di holfe leith neir̅ leyr̅ royf ath a vagsin faa a doch broone
Di ȝrwine ygin i̅ nathi tre Inny hool harrocher̅
Mon̅ nvrchur̅ neir̅ vy̅ny̅ dail dy̅ wayir̅ is din vakawe
Dathre dalve da drath ȝile sin la̅ve a bree pissyt
An la̅ve dollonyt ann di barda ag wlling
Neir̅ leer̅ din var̅haß og our̅ nor od par̅ris in puissone
[marginal ?] Essin ag bree roak rawre Isse ag dook er do va̅nyin̅
Marg traa nat dwryg ȝa Iig Inrow ni me̅a̅ si vakke
[marginal ?] r fag sin dilyr̅ da drath ȝil raȝiß in lanvola eggin
O harle wyl er moye clwmv̅n̅ dawnyt dyt ȝoo brone̅
Noyf enyt ag ath ga ny̅n̅ myg ar fisse a la̅vo la̅veig
Is ȝayin cwng na clat done tath dwlling pane si phresson
[marginal ?] Wille er si soig elle is feyvy̅ne na ir ny̅vy̅ne
[marginal s] Na vil ne solrs na soo oo ȝinee i̅ torsa thromsoo
In nabra ne henyt dette ar i̅ ney̅ a oge vake
ffye ȝeefin trayf a hvyȝin tyig elle ne hakoygis
[marginal ?] A vaka a vaka misse tra heth i̅ teig ȝorcha soo
[marginal ? id] Di we dothwa̅nna ort an̅n̅ is fort ollonyt ha̅nam
O sakkid is far̅ a ȝarve a ney̅n̅ erß in toge la̅wo
Na Kel orn̅ hy̅nathtyn ȝaa / Do wo̅rn y̅mytchree orn̅a
Losse in theil vor̅soo moyg as see hariß er dosse
Ma i̅ dyg ȝorcha no ȝeye a yr̅ chome̅ is kyn̅owin
Er linn erß i̅ la̅vo oge ga teit bronyt a ven̅ od
Is leyr̅ ȝwne̅a ir neil solse na beig er hwe athorß
Er clathtin dagkirra da nat doar̅ see soig bi evy̅na
Neir̅ ȝheß a ȝeoyg ȝreissour̅ ȝlan̅ er a vreisson foar̅ falloig
[marginal ?] Barrowle di varir̅ rown is di lanvo di wee si bresso̅n̅e̅
Iwth awai ka in cowlpla i̅ rai is bea phresson̅e̅
Re faksin neyryt vcȝee flayis ag wil boon̅ ree
[marginal ? G] w soig broon̅e̅ beagi downi sloig a waa is pussone̅ni
[marginal ?] Ni we i̅ tolse soo in theil sacha mvrn̅ meif noachreig
Teif re dail is do wes dotht at myr̅ hollaß clar̅ choolle
Ta edd̅ noyf ny̅neyg graye is evy̅nis talvm tone̅van̅
A wille edd̅ oyf ȝorra ȝowf & tolchyt i̅ nor̅ enytg
Is far̅ na loß we lowe [.] evy̅nis rißnatt Inchur̅ri
Ne boone̅ Inve a mortborn so moet toyr̅ Inve in tolso honni
Torskal teyg neif as si vrow ard Angli
Go dee y̅ bra͘a͘ agis bea reiß neir̅ ree la͘ cac͘ a da͘ryß
Mac ny͘ cr̅ony er cho̅mis doyf ag neif ane̅ oar̅ ȝaly ȝin
Di legfi mee in macsin woy̅m er E ȝaksin i̅nane̅ oar̅
An tallow gin ne dig ȝee de reoksin er heoch neve
Is gin egsin downa ȝei ȝoif achmai er couliv a chealle
Eßacht re heanlaa noif is cwt din choal angli
Ni hoy̅ne is de roig ȝea fer̅roo choal ni cron̅y
Imny orrydycht o̅o̅ne veinn ag mak ney̅ eaym̅
Not cha leyr̅ ȝin ȝl ar̅ sin gowt nat saysycht in pa̅e̅n̅ phekkow
Imni i̅ neiffrin na ȝei nec da gwr̅ri fa choave ra nne
Sulla agis wllaa arda o vill voyve er i̅ arba a
Iffrin attryf ny̅ dawin pusovne deyr̅ rt i̅ dwloyin
Rothtni Ilsean̅ treal dy̅ tyg ymkane̅ oraan̅ one̅ rehyg
Da vesteis fir i̅ do̅yin Sthaile Iffrin Ior̅ chor̅r̅
Re clastin di bi choor̅ Sthanma dave is gin agsin Iffrin
Di bi neof la ginach ann bas da͘wail is ne aywȝinin
Ne dul ne tar̅now is ste browt gin Invrowt aithin
[marginal x] Mynna gyt gooß acht a ȝaw losk ann is Imbaath y
Smaal blayth na batsee lotht Snaath nat traufe tessytht
Ige wrch achtyg heyinin pest a ter̅ ter̅ßchee Iffrin
Da vaig e Ig ryerk i̅ fer a chee is cwntwirt
Erow Iffrin nar̅ vakka ma͘ a gaynaa vog na vagsyt
[marginal ?] Re ny̅ nowle ga cvnni di cher̅re̅ si downa a ville gov
Ne treß er dea an du̅na tran̅ na i̅ botht di veiß na hir̅ran
Ne lair̅ tanna teyr er noif far̅ri a har̅re gi hail ȝean̅
Cree vr̅issil owle tig dee dwnna ȝer̅ dow
is loyeit is loir̅ dir̅ goylleȝeit oyere is a̅gil
Bea gin eiß gin vrchur̅ // doyve er soyna i̅nygyrra
Slanta gy̅ orkill d̅row faltee cholkin carddwoil
Muak a chreikfee teeg neif er ir̅ mvian bregginne
Ca hard nat beil a wooc in sseil it morg a wallis
Nar̅ Waltyr̅ ma ter mvrra lor̅ y̅ ȝenid i dey ȝoe
Goe oye woir̅ri is lor̅ lym̅ oyg is glor̅woir̅ri ȝoeym̅
Corle mvr̅re moi̅ra di ne mak ni mor̅ oye
layni treß i̅ oig noy ne ȝle meß me vanma / moig margit
Ergeik
Ag [.] s

challe gave Coane̅ a reiß ir meilsyt
Merfaid con dut a leith a boot ag cog on voyn v
challe wa dan eadma chinfeir̅ gow taik neiß mow
Vssit vic veitgyt gleik heg a fit fa thre sin loo
A fit fa doaris di chraw gi braa na be re sloo
fulling a froo di chat & cac fein di haich loo
Mag va̅ ny̅ nan vclor̅ sen akkil su la̅ne doo
A vuk a var̅ vir̅ ȝe ve gin Skeiß di ȝowyr̅ ee arestil boo
Mir sen veis a ven ga ȝaninn far er a too
Huggi a raac V C me lowyt ȝa far fenyt

etʅ Autor huius Cochondyt McKerla wo
Tesß mvr̅ chroytin clone̅ freit Ca stoyg not cha stoyg sa
[marginal B] Growny̅ skea mayn leic mlaye raany̅ glaic
Tosß mur̅t hawryt oliß lynn o chavle gar̅ es gow slaß
Caghyr̅ waaa char̅ wllgil crone̅ in mir̅ raa cwoi̅ in awro
Tosßmvr̅ chassil fa chosß na i̅ dow̅now g͘lasßin fea ȝ
Er orr vlg gren̅ nale glasß gw m͘aß cwrk dow
Neir̅ ȝaw moyve na cork na conc̅ porc er nar̅ hawyt
Di walli cheive na ȝi chrone̅ mir̅ chom seir̅ hal
Trawes haildi ȝar aige fwle is skaille gal ra
Not chai vest neit ȝa naive gon̅ lemm ast er a͘
Sra claryt vene̅ noulyt yloyt na stoyavg cheme̅ na
Slyt ord ry̅ nyt erirae blaasaly̅
verkgytsloypyt ȝai snoig na myr̅ ȝeiltis derbgnyt
one̅ chatri giu crann Keil slayvin a heive hawle on̅
haßnyt glan̅ donryrt a dlwß nat gawe ton̅ lasryt ȝa loß
syge tenni er a te heiß my̅ni hee greiß nawe / a noß
worl i̅ dagin a̅mit a ȝeit notchar̅ va̅nir̅ vaam reyve
nyr̅ leyvin caß clair̅ glaß lawe is gavin far geyl
ȝa telgin ge̅n gir terk notcha derg̅ chineyty inger
olk sley ȝa slyt brat neive ny̅ nord na hucht
chaytir ȝrevan er ȝrane̅ ne lawyr̅ meithhald a mvar
Aythyr̅ braich ni drave ra teive mir̅ clac eilgti teyg tur̅
a braat ben̅ gi braac ee i̅ raa ȝale / ra cach crai
lair̅i lingi a̅ treg er vreig di Kyn̅i daig ai
ra ȝrine̅ ir gi lair̅ laiß a tillit clair̅ mir̅ a coß
guullin o tole teiß one̅ chrone̅ veiß no ȝone̅ i̅ noß
deggi low va̅ni vrane̅ni na ȝin deit ȝeille da drem̅
tylyt at mir̅ terk loyna gin nerc sloe lan̅ vir̅ ȝa lem

A houd̅ so Duncha Mor̅ be voe Lawenacht
Mark dwnna a cayl a ȝoo agis ga vil schrow di ȝanna
Agis na ead gawal loa & nac͘ ool wea no hawe
Agis nac͘ synni cor̅ri na port & nac͘ gaive gy̅ locht leye
Agis nac͘ skur̅re di chrwt veynni & nat synni mir̅ is meynni
As marg nac͘ skur̅ da dryng drang agis di rann di, ray
Agis na cluntyr̅ a chrut & nac͘ tuggi̅ a ȝawn
As marg na toyr̅ toye da chael is nac͘ cu̅mn̅ a feyn slan̅
As marg a ver̅ traß gi treg ar a veß na rig a lave
Da be mo vea̅n̅ annsyt veß neach soygin a ȝrab go had
Di ȝor̅fin i̅ cranni fa vonni ga bea neach er a cur̅ mergmn

A houd̅ so gillecrist talȝr etc bod in stuyk
Bennyt di hylyt a threnoite a ree phar̅ris port nyn layk
Di hylyt neir̅ ȝann dit ȝoe how fein di ȝalve vlli ead
Is dutti di chommi seil nawȝoe di ȝroy͘ derk er da ny̅ sow
Ir a ve̅nyt port is pobbil malyt di lucht coggi cwlli
A ta chonvrt curst chwllan̅ danew wlk er clannow reicht
Gyn glwnnvm ayr̅ in genn gvnnit is lane̅ gi glenni dulli ȝeive
A lucht cogge er clanni awȝoe onac͘ fadir̅ vea nane̅ dost
Na geltow a chew ra chael / fertew ree ny̅ grein a gork
A luc͘t cogge er clan awȝoe di fre lucifeir̅ ny̅ lwbe
Na leg foiß na dein dy̅ drongsoo losk / a re nyt solsi sowd
Er eeß eith chappil clawyt nar̅is lane dy̅ choynnyt chwlle
Wer̅rit wpe i̅ nucht nyt selga legge brwct a melga moe
Mallit͘ nyt selga is a wor̅loye deeß eith keitryt is chrwe
Di chur̅ drwine ra foyd nyt foiche skeiltir̅ kinni a ȝaßre ȝoe
A ta gaßre vaddi vaßlaic Er layr̅ Inche ald art
lane truddyr̅ Eed treg a threnoit / Cur̅seir̅ eed a venoit valk
Ga ȝemmi crakkin chon alta agin vm clar̅si is vm chrute
Cha terga clakin foyr̅ fallwe aggin on choynni aalle vlk
Yr̅ crist dan sneicht seachin o loc͘ chabbir̅ gow ryn frewit
loyt a gonnil da gorpe knawe orthis olk a rait reveit͘
gon ga ner̅rik sen er scher̅chw di vakrobert ny̅ royt tee
A lac͘ venour̅ ni glenni gust is lenour̅ kenn crist er claa
A vil o vinni ȝulbin ȝrenta di vaddrow sooß goshrow tolve
Fissi er selgew sissi a soig derk ayr̅ o crist vlli orve
gi glwnny̅ is me i̅ ny̅vir̅ nissa meilchon skeilli ny̅ skonni
Marg ma nea balle ni bokneac͘ gon dea gallyr̅ tutmyt trommi
Stawyt connyt elsi is aggait er lucht varve ni grey glaß
Mak dey lai chre noy nawelyt gyt sneath a choyn an̅vyt ass
loska gi sywe hay scheit chellin a oone stewart ny̅ stead braafe
May ber woym ger shreyth schranwoor̅ a choyn ȝra̅ni ȝra̅vor̅
Er ȝar̅ri oyone̅ steadȝil stewart cha learroit cabbir̅ gy̅ chenn
Is eed er cha͘llew caß corryt a choyn nire ȝlassi vongi hoenni

A houd̅ so gillecallum mcy̅olle in far
[19th-century editorial note] Air clann Donaill
Ne heyvy̅nis gin clyne Donel ne corit veit nane naguß
In cland dyt var̅ sin grone̅vyt gar̅ ȝivi gyt done̅ catrew
Clann is seir̅ ȝor̅ ȝowe in rowe angnew is awȝiß
Clann ȝar̅ woil ne tern i̅ rowe creudyt is crawee
Clann chunlyt chalmyt chroyt clann byt hon toyth [marginal -]
Clann byt venyt i̅ mesk bra̅ [.] & at chalmyt i̅ goge
Clann ba lo nor̅ orryt Da Var̅ a̅nyt is ayrewe
Clann nar̅ chattyt er egliß clann lor̅ veggil i̅ ganyt
Gythy̅ane albin oyn clann i̅ croye ȝawe best
Gane royve treß gyt teir̅ sawik eil ergask
Clann bi wow is bi vir̅ clann bi ȝrinn is bi rait
Clann di barsingyt crei di bar̅ fydin is feil
mek ree nar̅ hoyle i̅ ner̅ in royve dy̅tyt is trome
Fir alda olsai one̅ nour̅ in royve brontyt is boke
Clann di bar feine is faßgyt clann di bar gasg laive
Olklome gyr̅rit er̅nyt in ve lar̅ snevyt in snaitht
Neir̅ vait nyt drothir̅ voyir̅ na ni fir lowore lagi
re dol in na̅nit volc fir nat croy nyt cragi
Clann gin nowar̅ gin naik goir̅ nar̅ ȝove ac͘ eddoil chogge
Gar̅ vamnyt den olsai & gar̅ vonyt boddi /
Mark vor̅ ruggi i̅ nyin mark a ȝyil rane̅ gaddrew
Gy̅nyne̅ clann mir clann donil ser̅ c͘lann byt chorit agna
Gy̅ arew er̅ yt vrdil gy̅ c͘oncta er i̅ dossew
Gy̅ creit gin twß gin der̅ra er a̅nyt ag in vnolsewe
In dossyt clynnyt donil de vee folim ga faynyt
& di wi nane dir̅ryt fein̅ is a̅nyt is nar̅
Er wrone̅ & er hursa dyt reyggis twgß is foly̅m̅
Gyt inne orcht reygis ne hevy̅nis gin c͘lynn donil / Nehi
bi trane geych agus tor̅rin fa nacmaa chrendyt corit
ga tayd i̅ dar fa ȝevis ne hevy̅ gi̅
Na sloya vor̅ is i̅ grym y̅ mur̅n̅ si myr̅ si wonyt
vi na vagwß ne hevy̅
Makane lave na wymmyt der̅ seryt er gyt dorin
Ga ta ai ȝone delis ne hevy̅nis gin clynn donil / Ne he̅vynis

Maac͘t a tee i̅ sen a neil gy̅ done̅na ac͘t how feyn is tee
Ga bi ȝerre vee i̅ mesk chae my̅ anyr̅ It ta nur sen̅
Myr nanyr̅ Id ta mir sen ir veg is twggin peynna
Di quhoye eissa feynea da ȝone̅ra si feayna vor̅ i̅ vil enail
Vischal aggin er i̅ derka sin c͘vrra i̅ guil di chaict
Aggʃ er owyr̅ ny̅ botht ne far̅ we i̅ dost na raac͘t
Bicht di quhoye ai herin voyne turriß troe ȝul ra ha [marginal -]
Ȝaig a cwtdyt a fa reir̅ in ramis ny̅ ryg͘ sin rank͘
Gowis gallir in for bocht da nar ead sai ȝul i̅ vad
chai in skailsen fai reir̅ is ranik i̅ re ga bo ȝad
Cur ai somr erfin ree͘ moddow bre i̅ donna vo͘cht
A̅ne ȝa nerin a vail huggyr̅ ro gin lane̅ gy̅ locht
Currir̅ i̅ somr i̅ bocht sne roithe locht er a rer̅ir
Ane̅ ne ȝa naryt ȝa ȝnaa de ȝoeve o chaic͘ awayn̅
a char̅rit a bor̅re sin rank͘ degg̅ ne no gend da c͘wrra
ree frank feine̅ si venea vak marre sin techdow
In techtdow di bi ȝarre ȝeve vagwß in ree vaan̅
